on reading compounds: 辟【ヘキ】false, punish, crime, law, ruler
辟易【ヘキエキ】to be stumped, to be nonplussed, to be disconcerted, to dumbfounded, to be fed up with, to be tired of, to find unable to bear, to wince, to shrink back, to cringe
大辟【タイヘキ】severe punishment, death penalty
復辟【フクヘキ】restoration (of an abdicated ruler)
